data.message: Fabian look at all these comments of the buthurt trump supporting fuckers 😂 as if Em' gives a shit about such idiots turning their back on him cuz' he dissed that orange wanker 😂

replies.message: He made it REAL CLEAR what he thinks of them... LOL!
Who cares about eminem. He us just a rapper
Hi, it's me, Fabian, I looked at them. Thanks for encouraging me, Michael.😅🙃
sorry to tell you bud, but eminem doesnt care about you either, just your greenbacks.
And I don't care wether he cares about me or not, as long as he continues to keep it real. And that freestyle was realtalk as its finest.
Paul Gieseler keep it real? The crackheads' son is a sellout.
He will care when he looses much of his fans and money...Don't bite the hand that feeds you...Just look at the NFL...they are scrambling right now!
Like we give a shit what Germany pukes like you have to say , Your country is under invasion by ISIS  lol
Tim Roberts got that right but these idiots think they are in the IN GROUP.  Lmao 😂 total losers that no one gives a shit about especially people like E. He cares about no one but himself. Hahahaha 😂
Jeffrey Crisp you pedo looking cunt.
They look pathetic and desperate, telling him they are done. He already told them to fuck off. They are that crazy ex  who won't let go

That "freestyle" was garbage Paul. And it wasn't keeping it real and it wasn't "real talk." It was a piss poor way to try and please his Masters, create a stir and promote a new record. People in Hollywood and the music industry are no longer allowed to have their own thoughts. The "freestyle" says it all. He rapped about the same virtue signaling crap the rest of Hollywood has been for years. 1. Umm your racist 2. Gun reform 3. Let's let anyone come here and live for free 4. You're orange 5. Making fun of southerners 6. Communist manifesto garbage so on and so on. There's no mistake why He sounds like everyone in Hollywood now.... It was his turn. Next week it will be some other agenda driven and paid for puppet on a string dancing for the establishment and the new world order to keep their careers.
